meta.title: CustomField - Models - API Reference
meta.description: Gets custom fields associated with a product. These allow you to specify additional information that will appear on the product's page, such as a book's...

blocks.data: Gets custom fields associated with a product. These allow you to specify additional information that will appear on the product's page, such as a book's ISBN or a DVD's release date.

name.description: The name of the field, shown on the storefront, orders, etc.

value.description: The name of the field, shown on the storefront, orders, etc.

id.description: The unique numeric ID of the custom field; increments sequentially.
